scenes.description: Vestia Zeta and Kazama Iroha admire the 3D 'Zeta's Club' interior.
The two discover and play with a cat on the floor.
Zeta gives Iroha a 'ZETAMIN' vitamin bottle as a present.
They sit down and Zeta explains that she invited Iroha because she likes her.
They discuss their collaboration on the song 'Gaze on Me'.
Iroha has to leave but promises to cheer for Zeta from the VIP seat.

subtitles.original: おっ、お洒落でござるな。
subtitles.english: Oh, it's so stylish de-gozaru na.

subtitles.original: うた、これゼタズクラブだから、ちょっとお洒落に。
subtitles.english: Since this is Zeta's Club, it's a bit stylish.

subtitles.original: ね、すごいお洒落！
subtitles.english: Right? It's so stylish!

subtitles.original: うおー！ステージがあっちでござるな。あとこっちから来たから、
subtitles.english: Whoa! The stage is over there. And I came from this way,

subtitles.original: お、すごい！かっこいいね、ゼタ。
subtitles.english: Oh, amazing! It's cool, Zeta.

subtitles.original: うん、めっちゃかっこいい。え、猫もあるよ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, super cool. Oh, there's a cat too.

subtitles.original: 猫！見る？見る？
subtitles.english: A cat! You want to see? You want to see?

subtitles.original: 猫見る！見る見る！
subtitles.english: I want to see the cat! I want to see, I want to see!

subtitles.original: 猫だ！
subtitles.english: It's a cat!

subtitles.original: 猫！
subtitles.english: Cat!

subtitles.original: 触ってもいい？あ、いい？
subtitles.english: Can I pet it? Oh, it's okay?

subtitles.original: 猫、猫！猫可愛い、猫可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cat, cat! Cat's cute, cat's cute!

subtitles.original: 可愛い！猫可愛いでござるな、猫可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cute! Cat is cute de-gozaru na, cat's cute!

subtitles.original: あ、違う、猫じゃない。あ、違う違う。猫じゃない。ゼタ猫。
subtitles.english: Ah, no, it's not a cat. Ah, no no. It's not a cat. Zeta cat.

subtitles.original: あ、耳じゃない。あ、耳じゃない。そうかそうか。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's not ears. Ah, it's not ears. I see, I see.

subtitles.original: 猫可愛い、猫可愛い、ゼタも可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cat's cute, cat's cute, Zeta's also cute!

subtitles.original: 可愛いね。
subtitles.english: You're cute.

subtitles.original: え、あとあと、なんか... 実はね、プレゼントがあって。プレゼントあげます！
subtitles.english: Um, also, also, like... actually, I have a present. I'll give you a present!

subtitles.original: あ、やった！プレゼント！
subtitles.english: Oh, yay! A present!

subtitles.original: これ。ゼタミン。
subtitles.english: This. Zetamin.

subtitles.original: ZETAMIN
subtitles.english: ZETAMIN

subtitles.original: え、すごい！ゼタミン！これ飲んだら...
subtitles.english: Eh, amazing! Zetamin! If I drink this...

subtitles.original: 頭が賢くなる。強、強、強い。
subtitles.english: Your head becomes smart. Strong, strong, strong.

subtitles.original: 強、強い！そうそう、もっと強くなる。
subtitles.english: Strong, strong! Yeah, yeah, you'll become even stronger.

subtitles.original: すごい！パワーアップアイテム！
subtitles.english: Amazing! A power-up item!

subtitles.original: いや、パワーアップアイテム！
subtitles.english: Indeed, a power-up item!

subtitles.original: スペシャルアイテム！
subtitles.english: A special item!

subtitles.original: やったー！サンキュー、ゼタ。大事にします。ありがとう、大事にしよう。
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you, Zeta. I'll treasure it. Thank you, I'll treasure it.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、どうぞ座ってください。
subtitles.english: Well then, please take a seat.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。じゃあちょっとね、座ろうかな。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Then I'll, you know, sit down.

subtitles.original: 喋ろう。
subtitles.english: Let's talk.

subtitles.original: うわー、すごい。椅子もとてもいい感じでござるな。
subtitles.english: Whoa, amazing. This chair is also very nice de-gozaru na.

subtitles.original: いいよね。ふわふわ。
subtitles.english: It's nice, right? Fluffy.

subtitles.original: ね、改めて今日は呼んでくれてありがとうでござる。
subtitles.english: Hey, thanks again for inviting me today de-gozaru.

subtitles.original: いいえ、こちらこそありがとう。
subtitles.english: No, thank you as well.

subtitles.original: なんで今日はさ、風真のこと呼んでくれたの？
subtitles.english: So, why did you invite Kazama today?

subtitles.original: え、好きだから。
subtitles.english: Uh, because I like you.

subtitles.original: えー！そんな、そんなストレートに... 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Ehh! So... so straightforwardly... I'm happy!

subtitles.original: え、コラボとかもさ、なんか...
subtitles.english: Um, and we've collaborated, like...

subtitles.original: あ、確かに、何回か。っていうか、いっぱいくらいかな？2、3回して... 結構何回かしてる。
subtitles.english: Ah, certainly, a few times. Or rather, quite a lot? 2 or 3 times... quite a few times.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Right, right, right.

subtitles.original: なんか、まあ、とにかく好きになっちゃって。
subtitles.english: Like, well, anyway, I've come to like you.

subtitles.original: え、そんな... 嬉しいでござる。
subtitles.english: Ehh... I'm so happy de-gozaru.

subtitles.original: それで呼んでくれたんだ、今日。
subtitles.english: That's why you invited me today.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。で、今日ね、一緒に歌わせていただいた曲が「Gaze on Me」っていう曲で、
subtitles.english: Thank you. And today, the song we sang together was "Gaze on Me",

subtitles.original: その、風真も、あの、すいせい先輩の3Dライブで知ったんだけど、ゼタもすいせい先輩の3Dライブで知ったんだっけ？
subtitles.english: And, Kazama also, um, learned it from Suisei-senpai's 3D live, but did Zeta also learn it from Suisei-senpai's 3D live?

subtitles.original: そうそう。見たことあって。
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. I've seen it.

subtitles.original: そうってことでね、この曲一緒に歌わせていただけて... いや、楽しかった。一緒に歌えて楽しかったでござる。
subtitles.english: Right, so, being able to sing this song together... man, it was fun. It was fun singing together de-gozaru.

subtitles.original: いや、曲はね、「Gaze on Me」。曲が本当に好きなので、
subtitles.english: No, the song, "Gaze on Me". I really love the song, so...

subtitles.original: なんか、お二人で一緒に踊りたい、歌いたい。し、だから選んだ。
subtitles.english: Like, I wanted the two of us to dance and sing together. That's why I chose it.

subtitles.original: はー！呼んでくれたんだ、風真のことを。風真のこと選んでくれたってこと。
subtitles.english: Haa! So you invited me. You chose Kazama.

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！ありがとう！でも本当に一緒に歌って踊れて、すごく楽しかったでござる。
subtitles.english: I'm happy! Thank you! But really, being able to sing and dance together was so much fun de-gozaru.

subtitles.original: ね、風真これからもゼタと一緒に歌ったり踊ったり、せっかく3Dになったから、すごくやりたいなって思うんだけど、ゼタはどうですか？
subtitles.english: Hey, from now on Kazama wants to sing and dance with Zeta, especially since we're finally 3D. What do you think, Zeta?

subtitles.original: え、一緒にダンスしたい！一緒に歌いたい！
subtitles.english: Eh, I want to dance together! I want to sing together!

subtitles.original: 本当に？やった！それじゃあこれからもいっぱいいっしょに歌って、踊って、やろうね！
subtitles.english: Really? Yay! Then from now on, let's sing and dance together a lot!

subtitles.original: またやろうね！他の曲もやりましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's do it again! Let's do other songs too!

subtitles.original: や、やりましょう。はい、ね。今日は本当に改めて呼んでくれてありがとう、そして、3Dおめでとうでござる！
subtitles.english: Ye... yes, let's. Yes. Truly, thank you again for inviting me today, and congratulations on your 3D de-gozaru!

subtitles.original: わー、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Wow, thank you!

subtitles.original: 風真そろそろ行かなきゃいけないけど...
subtitles.english: Kazama has to go soon, but...

subtitles.original: どこ行くの？行くの？行っちゃうの？
subtitles.english: Where are you going? You're going? You're leaving?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、ずっと近くでゼタのこのあとのステージも見てるでござるから。だからね、応援してる、ゼタ。頑張って。
subtitles.english: It's okay, I'll be watching Zeta's stage from close by after this. So, I'm cheering for you, Zeta. Good luck.

subtitles.original: 行っちゃだめ！行っちゃだめ！行っちゃだめ！行っちゃだめ！行っちゃだめ！寂しいの、寂しい。
subtitles.english: Don't go! Don't go! Don't go! Don't go! Don't go! I'll be lonely, lonely.

subtitles.original: え、わかった、風真特等席で見てる。ずっと見てるから、このあとも頑張って。ずっと見てるよ。じゃあ頑張る、頑張る！よし、じゃあ大好き！もう頑張ろうね、風真と心は一つだよ。
subtitles.english: Eh, okay, Kazama will watch from the VIP seat. I'll be watching the whole time, so do your best after this. I'm always watching. Then I'll do my best, my best! Okay, then I love you! Let's do our best, our hearts are as one.
